Detailed Description

This class abstracts the statistics of a given tree.

The current version implements:

  • mean object size;
  • level statistics;
  • optimal tree statistics;
  • FatFactor (specific, local and absolute).
Author
Fabio Jun Takada Chino (chino.nosp@m.@icm.nosp@m.c.usp.nosp@m..br)
Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvie.nosp@m.ira@.nosp@m.icmc..nosp@m.usp..nosp@m.br)

Member Function Documentation

virtual double stTreeInfoResult::GetAbsoluteFatFactor ( )
pure virtual

Returns the absolute FatFactor for this tree. The result of this method is meanless if HasOptimalTree() returned false.

Implemented in stTreeInformation.

pure virtual

Returns the global FatFactor.

Implemented in stTreeInformation.

pure virtual

Returns the maximum height of the tree.

Implemented in stTreeInformation.

pure virtual

Returns the FatFactor for a given level.

Parameters
levelThe level number.

Implemented in stTreeInformation.

virtual double stTreeInfoResult::GetMeanObjectSize ( )
pure virtual

Returns the mean size of the objects stored in the tree. This value is useful to help tree developers to calculate the optimal tree.

Implemented in stTreeInformation.

virtual int stTreeInfoResult::GetMinHeight ( )
pure virtual

Returns the minimum height of the tree.

Implemented in stTreeInformation.

virtual int stTreeInfoResult::GetObjectCount ( )
pure virtual

Returns the number of objects indexed by the tree.

Implemented in stTreeInformation.

virtual int stTreeInfoResult::GetOptimalHeight ( )
pure virtual

Returns the optimal height of the tree. The result of this method is meanless if HasOptimalTree() returned false.

Implemented in stTreeInformation.

virtual bool stTreeInfoResult::HasOptimalTree ( )
pure virtual

Returns true if this information includes the optimal tree data.

Implemented in stTreeInformation.

virtual void stTreeInfoResult::Invalidate ( )
pure virtual

This method invalidates the current calculated FatFactor data. These data will be recalculated again when required.

Implemented in stTreeInformation.
